title: Gifting Xayah and/or Rakan question
body:
Hey!

I had a quick question: Can you also gift Xayah or Rakan with RP /AND/ also getting the icon? Or can you only get the icon if you gift with IP?

replies.body: Yep! The [**event page **](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions) focuses on the fact that you can buy them with IP, but you can still get the icon by gifting them with RP if you want!
You can get it for gifting with RP, yes.
